Structs/Calc.html#/s:17SwiftFortuneWheel.name: circularSegmentHeight(radius:from:)
Structs/Calc.html#/s:17SwiftFortuneWheel.abstract: Circular segment height for radius and degree

Structs/Slice/ContentType.html.name: ContentType
Structs/Slice/ContentType.html.abstract: Slice content type, currently image or text

Structs/TextPreferences.html#/s:17SwiftF.name: horizontalOffset
Structs/TextPreferences.html#/s:17SwiftF.abstract: Horizontal offset in slice from the center, default value is 0

Structs/TextPreferences.html#/s:17SwiftF.name: verticalOffset
Structs/TextPreferences.html#/s:17SwiftF.abstract: Vertical offset in slice from the center

Structs/TextPreferences.html#/s:17SwiftF.name: flipUpsideDown
Structs/TextPreferences.html#/s:17SwiftF.abstract: Flip the text upside down, default value is true

Structs/TextPreferences.html#/s:17SwiftF.name: isCurved
Structs/TextPreferences.html#/s:17SwiftF.abstract: Is text curved or not, works only with orientation equal to horizontal, default value is true

Structs/TextPreferences.html#/s:17SwiftF.name: lineBreakMode
Structs/TextPreferences.html#/s:17SwiftF.abstract: The technique to use for wrapping and truncating the label’s text, default value is .clip

Structs/TextPreferences.html#/s:17SwiftF.name: numberOfLines
Structs/TextPreferences.html#/s:17SwiftF.abstract: The maximum number of lines to use for rendering text., default valie is 1

Structs/TextPreferences.html#/s:17SwiftF.name: alignment
Structs/TextPreferences.html#/s:17SwiftF.abstract: The technique to use for aligning the text, default value is .left

Structs/TextPreferences/LineBreakMode.ht.name: LineBreakMode
Structs/TextPreferences/LineBreakMode.ht.abstract: The technique to use for wrapping and truncating the label’s text

Structs/TextPreferences.html#/s:17SwiftF.name: color(for:)
Structs/TextPreferences.html#/s:17SwiftF.abstract: Creates a color for text, relative to slice index position

Structs/TextPreferences.html#/s:17SwiftF.name: textAttributes(for:)
Structs/TextPreferences.html#/s:17SwiftF.abstract: Creates text attributes, relative to slice index position

Structs/SFWConfiguration/SpinButtonPrefe.name: textAttributes
Structs/SFWConfiguration/SpinButtonPrefe.abstract: Creates text attributes, relative to slice index position

Structs/SFWConfiguration/WheelPreference.name: layerInsets
Structs/SFWConfiguration/WheelPreference.abstract: Layer insets, used to center the drawing such that offseted graphics(e.g Shadows, Outer Glows) are not clipped.

Structs/SFWConfiguration/WheelPreference.name: imageAnchor
Structs/SFWConfiguration/WheelPreference.abstract: Image anchor for each slice, located at the wheel’s border, optional

Structs/SFWConfiguration/WheelPreference.name: centerImageAnchor
Structs/SFWConfiguration/WheelPreference.abstract: Image anchor for each slice, located at the center of wheel’s border, optional

Structs/SFWConfiguration/ColorType.html.name: ColorType
Structs/SFWConfiguration/ColorType.html.abstract: Color type, used to color the item with the particularized pattern.

Structs/SFWConfiguration/AnchorImage.htm.name: AnchorImage
Structs/SFWConfiguration/AnchorImage.htm.abstract: Anchor image used to add images around the wheel for each slice

Structs/SFWConfiguration/ContentMode.htm.name: ContentMode
Structs/SFWConfiguration/ContentMode.htm.abstract: Content can be drawn by specified mode

Structs/LinePreferences.html#/s:17SwiftF.name: verticalOffset
Structs/LinePreferences.html#/s:17SwiftF.abstract: Vertical offset in slice from the center

Structs/ImagePreferences.html#/s:17Swift.name: horizontalOffset
Structs/ImagePreferences.html#/s:17Swift.abstract: Horizontal offset in slice from the center, default value is 0

Structs/ImagePreferences.html#/s:17Swift.name: verticalOffset
Structs/ImagePreferences.html#/s:17Swift.abstract: Vertical offset in slice from the center

Structs/ImagePreferences.html#/s:17Swift.name: flipUpsideDown
Structs/ImagePreferences.html#/s:17Swift.abstract: Flip the text upside down, default value is false

Structs/SFWConfiguration.html.name: SFWConfiguration
Structs/SFWConfiguration.html.abstract: Configuration, contains preferences to configure a fortune wheel

Structs/Slice.html.name: Slice
Structs/Slice.html.abstract: Slice object that will be drawn as a custom content

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS17SwiftFortu.name: crop(by:font:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:SS17SwiftFortu.abstract: Crops string by specified width and font

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS17SwiftFortu.name: replaceLastCharactersWithDots(count:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:SS17SwiftFortu.abstract: Replaces characters with dots at the end

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS17SwiftFortu.name: linesCount(for:spacing:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:SS17SwiftFortu.abstract: Сounts the right amount of lines for text

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS17SwiftFortu.name: width(by:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:SS17SwiftFortu.abstract: Avalilable width for text with specified font

Classes/SpinButton.html#/s:17SwiftFortun.name: configure(with:)

Classes/PinImageView.html#/s:17SwiftFort.name: configure(with:)
Classes/PinImageView.html#/s:17SwiftFort.abstract: Updates pin image view background color and layer

Classes/SpinningWheelAnimator.html#/s:17.name: currentRotationPosition
Classes/SpinningWheelAnimator.html#/s:17.abstract: Current rotation position used to know where is last time rotation stopped

Classes/SwiftFortuneWheel.html#/s:17Swif.name: startAnimating(rotationOffset:fullRotationsUntilFinish:animationDuration:_:)
Classes/SwiftFortuneWheel.html#/s:17Swif.abstract: Starts rotation animation and stops rotation at the specified rotation offset angle

Classes/SwiftFortuneWheel.html#/s:17Swif.name: startAnimating(finishIndex:fullRotationsUntilFinish:animationDuration:_:)
Classes/SwiftFortuneWheel.html#/s:17Swif.abstract: Starts rotation animation and stops rotation at the specified index

Classes/SwiftFortuneWheel.html#/s:17Swif.abstract: Starts rotation animation and stops rotation at the specified index and rotation angle offset

Classes/SwiftFortuneWheel.html#/c:@CM@Sw.name: pinImage
Classes/SwiftFortuneWheel.html#/c:@CM@Sw.abstract: Pin image name from assets catalog, sets image to the pinImageView

Classes/SwiftFortuneWheel.html#/c:@CM@Sw.name: spinImage
Classes/SwiftFortuneWheel.html#/c:@CM@Sw.abstract: Spin button image name from assets catalog, sets image to the spinButton

Classes/SwiftFortuneWheel.html#/c:@CM@Sw.name: spinBackgroundImage
Classes/SwiftFortuneWheel.html#/c:@CM@Sw.abstract: Spin button background image from assets catalog, sets background image to the spinButton

Classes/SwiftFortuneWheel.html#/c:@CM@Sw.name: spinTitle
Classes/SwiftFortuneWheel.html#/c:@CM@Sw.abstract: Spin button title text, sets title text to the spinButton

Classes/PinImageView.html.name: PinImageView
Classes/PinImageView.html.abstract: Pin or anchor image view, that usually represents an arrow to point in selected slice.

Classes/SpinButton.html.name: SpinButton
Classes/SpinButton.html.abstract: Spin button located at the center of the fotune wheel view.

Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
